title: David Tennant's wife Georgia confirms arrival of their fifth child
text:
David and Georgia Tennant have welcomed their fifth child.

The pair quietly announced the arrival of the latest addition to their brood with the help of a meme – making a cheeky dig at David’s Good Omens co-star Michael Sheen for good measure.

In a meme-style photograph, David can be seen at elevator doors with a baby carrier holding his sleeping baby on the right hand side.

Directly next to it is an identical shot from Michael, which was used to announce the arrival of his own daughter at the beginning of September.

Georgia posted the photo alongside the caption: ‘An Angel, a Demon and a couple of babies.

‘What could possibly go wrong?’

The private pair have not confirmed the baby’s sex, with no other statement given.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for the couple for comment.

The couple keep their children away from the public eye (Picture: Dave J Hogan/Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

The meme style announcement is a throwback to Sheen and Tennant’s work on the Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett TV series adaptation of their Good Omens book.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The story followed Angel Aziraphale (Sheen) and Devil Crawley (Tennant) trying to save the world from the apocalypse.

In order to do that, they have to track down the Antichrist (an 11-year-old boy) before it’s too late.

More: David Tennant What song is Olivia Colman covering for Children In Need and when will she be singing it? Will there be a Criminal season 2 on Netflix and who's in the cast? When is Katherine Kelly’s new drama Criminal on Netflix?

David and Georgia have been married since 2011, and have kept their children away from the public eye.

David adopted Georgia’s son Ty, 17, and together they also have Olive, 8, Wilfred, 6 and Doris, 4.

description: David and Georgia Tennant announced they were expecting their fifth child in May, and paid tribute to Good Omens and Michael Sheen in the photo
